cmpReviews: -Unload trucks, sort the freight or packages off the truck, organize by delivery destination, deliver to end user.-Do all misc. work that comes up and whatever is required for the day.good place to work with and a good management  ,to be a mobile engineer where I work independently, and get help from my co-worker if I need it, I  enjoy have my own schedule.JLL is a great place to work in a diverse, culture friendly environment. Opportunities exist for advancement. The benefits are great and the PTO time far exceeds need.I enjoyed working at the company. Learned several things. Enacted knowledge and skill in productive environment. Interacted with top class of management, executives, and intern staff in top company.Same routine...Tools Inventory,Jobs/Projects for the day,work orders,Visual Inspection,Preventative Maintenance to Safety Equipment and  Issues.Ok job just very unprofessional. They didn't have work for me to do some day's, i would sit there for hours without anything to do, we would consistently let the supervisor know he really didn't care.When I worked for JLL I was employed at the Alcon plant in Huntington, West Virginia.  The management and staff teams were all great and extremely professional. I would work for them again. If you ever have a opportunity to work for this company say "Yes!!" Great Company!!JLL is a great company with great people working for it.  Property Management is a different beast and is difficult to maintain a work life balance.  I would prefer to work in corporate because it seems they have more of a work life balance.I was numer six in two years to be let go or quit, think twice about working for a company that's so big your just are a number and disposable. You can tell by the upper mgt they change on a monthly basis, look it up.Very fast paced, automated Amazon sort center, responsible for all MHE and building. Overseeing a professional crew of Technicians, and Control Specialists. Duties include hiring, training, payroll, metrics reports, EHS, purchasing, and budgeting.   Predictive and preventive maintenance for the equipment and building. The building I run is the second largest Auto sort center in the network, and one of the highest rated.manager on this account is difficult, able to work on your now. a lot of changes not able to get a clear understanding of what's expected of you.  Management on this account doesn't have room for promotions from within.Professional Real Estate company which has provided tremendous opportunities for management and working with clients.  Strong culture and willingness to help and work within the firm.  Strong ethics and industry leading pratices.Good job bad management.  Great safety training. Great benifits. Communication  bad with upper management. Great That's all I would like to share.I have been with JLL for 1.5 years and LOVE IT! The unique culture, the flexibility (work from home option), and support have been amazing. The company has a global presence, but still has the personal interaction between upper management and employees that you would usually only experience in a smaller company. The company is financially stable and treats employees with respect. I have met a lot of coworkers that have been with the company for over ten years. I have worked for global corporations as well as small to medium organizations, and JLL is by far the best company that I have ever worked for.Fast paced cutting technology for order fulfillment at Amazon.  Subcontractor in building to support Amazon equipment and treated like red headed step child by Amazon management. JLL management was not willing to push back.I had a very good working relationship working at Merck. Co-workers very helpful. I enjoyed my responsibilities. I had the opportunity to work with some very talentd engineers and Project ManagersManaged onsite and offsite records for each department.  Answer phones, filing, scanning, copying and various other office duties.cost savings and lean staffing can result in less-than-competitive salary and financial compensationmust be a self-started to get ahead outside of individual accountGreat place to work. Flexible work hours and at home days when needed. Management is ok and people are easy to work with. Just moved into a new building in Pittsburgh.The department executives were down to earth, very supportive and included me in special projects which demonstrated their confidence in me.If I were to describe the office environment, I would say professional and supportive.JLL is a great company that values their employees, both work life and personal. I have not one negative comment to say about them.
